title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Giving yourself more self-love generates more love around you. You might have people in your life who can teach you how to show your feelings, but you must start by standing on solid ground. Perhaps youre not taking time to give yourself the tender loving care you need, so you seek affirmation from others, instead. Unfortunately, they dont seem to be as attentive as you had hoped today. However, once you step into the caregiving role for yourself, you wont be so dependent on everyone else. Choose wisely; you can either be your own best friend or your worst enemy. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
